document_data.name: Palace of the Watchmen
document_data.mainbody: The '''Palace of the Watchmen''' was a barracks for the city watch located in the city of [[Dhaztanar]] in [[Semphar]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Palace of the Watchmen was located within the [[Quarters of the Unclean]] district in east Dhaztanar. It sat near the far eastern edge of the city along the [[Silk Road]] and [[Tarkhold River]].
document_data.Description: The compound was quite large and surrounded by a defensive wall.
